_sText:
UPDATE: SOME CRUCIAL MISTAKES WITH TELEPORTERS ARE FIXED

It includes:

a running chamber : one player can race against another player  (made it so that the loser gets a red light and the winner a green one)

a shot for shot place 

guntoss 

3 cells 

many rebel spots and an rebel route

an moving bullseye (for fun :P )  

and a secret room with a secret combination u have too unlock all over the map :D 

the terrorist spawn below.. and the ct's spawn on the second floor

an chicken/knife fight room (or just use it for something else)
